page.title: 04Arable Farming
page.content: Arable farming predominates in this area.A variety of arable crops are grown.Recently Oil Seed Rape has been very popular(producing oil for margarine).Cereal crops predominate,mainly wheat and barley. Potatoes and sugar beet were in great evidence particularly on the Weald Moors at Eyton where a lot of land improvements have taken place including drainage and uprooting hedges to make larger fields.In some cases ten or more fields have been turned into one making it possible to use very large farm machinery.Eyton Estates own one of the largest tractors in this country.Heavy use of artificial fertilizers and irrigation enable peaty soils to produce large yields.Oats peas and maize are grown on a smaller scale with maize as winter feed.
